website_summaries.verdict: The Tend Secure's Lynx Pro needs some work before I can recommend it as a fully functional facial recognition camera.
pros: Tend Secure's $150 Lynx Pro camera has a decent list of features: free 7-day event-based cloud video storage, a weatherproof exterior, built-in local storage, battery backup and integration with Alexa and Google Assistant
cons: The camera didn't do particularly well recognizing the faces I added to my facial recognition database in the app -- or even picking up on faces at all

customer_reviews.title: Often fails to record
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it words fine. No problem accessing the camera in real time. The problem is that often it - or, really, the servers on the Tend website - fail to record events for long stretches of time. Look at the picture I attached. These were the recorded videos of my family room on Thanksgiving day, when it was full of activity all day long. After 10am no recordings for the entire day. These recording failures are common. It useless to have a security camera that can't be relied on to record events.
customer_reviews.author: Alsand

customer_reviews.title: Great Security Camera
customer_reviews.text: There are multiple things that we like about Tend's Lynx Pro security camera. 1. We like its compact size. 2. We like that its stylish/has a modern look. 3. Very easy install and app setup. 4. The product guide is very easy to understand and has good instruction pictures. 5. The two year defect return warranty is more that fair. A couple of things we would like changed: 1. More camera color options to choose from would be nice. 2. Not sure if possible but if it could run on a long life battery too that would give more location installation options. Overall a very good buy, can't go wrong by buying this camera.
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: work ok for as long that it works
customer_reviews.text: after few months of using this cam i can say its a ok cam nothing more, and here is why: 1.the cam usually recored only for max of 10-30 second. even if there is still someone or something unusual at your door or where you installed it... 2.the most annoying part is that almost every 1-2 months the cam need hand reset for it to work. and it could maybe be ok for some, but only if its not at a high point....i need a ladder every time and its really not comfortable. 3.plus its seems every reset delete all the previos videos too... looking backward it was not the best choise...
customer_reviews.author: Meir

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Unstable app, freezes and requires reboot frequently. Wifi range is horrible, less than 20 feet from Airport router, (1 bar), added wifi range extender now placed 6 feet inside exterior wall from camera (1 bar). I have Stuart cams from same company further away from router in my garage that work flawlessly. Don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: scott w.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, 7 days to see videos, download for free, no subscription! The camera is working great, great picture, range is limited but good enough for my driveway. The face recognition works only if they look at the camera for a couple seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan F. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Company is knowingly selling defective cameras and not honoring warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product but we had to return it after corresponding with a rep from Tend. The rep informed me that they are aware of faulty hardware in the cameras and it would be impossible to recall all the cameras. They are knowingly selling defective cameras! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Roger D Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Love this security camera - easy set up - clear videos
customer_reviews.text: I love this security camera - it was so easy to attach to the house and set up the app on my iPhone. Instructions were very clear. It senses motion and records - you can see who is at the door when you are in another part of the house or out. You can easily delete the recorded videos on your iPhone app, after viewing to save space. I am so glad I purchased it. Amazingly easy process. Def 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Hansen

customer_reviews.title: quit working less than 1 year in
customer_reviews.text: No product support for amazon purchases. No phone number to call, All online help is tunnel vision, everything is the internet connection fault. Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cameras goes off line too often
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this camera is not as hood as ring the mention came a few minutes after and I have a very high speed internet also my back camera keep going if line far too often which means you gave notification every minute literally
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and useless
customer_reviews.text: They go offline and can't be reset remotely. If you want to mount them where they can't be tampered with they are useless. We bought them for our vacation home and now they are offline. For security they are unreliable and useless. Support blames it on wifi strength but we are within 20 ft of our router. Wifi is not the problem, it's clearly in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, high quality camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great, high quality camera for the price. The camera is very well constructed, with a great, hd wide-angle lens. Set up is easy. I had this connected and going in less than five minutes out of the box. The app works great, is simple to use, and provides straighforward features for recording, setting sensitivity of motion detection... While I haven't yet set or tried the facial recognition, the camera does have it, and you can set the notifications to alert you to those who appear. Overall, a great camera for indoors or out.
customer_reviews.author: L Bandini

customer_reviews.title: wifi
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, easy and fast installation. A bit weak connection to the wifi if we move away from the router, comparing it with a despicable me camera or flexicam that is from the same manufacturer this last one has better wifi coverage,
customer_reviews.author: Reybel

customer_reviews.title: Great zooming ability - backyard dog camera
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good overall. The microphone is spotty sometimes it goes out. However when it does work I can actually here the neighbors talking which was unexpected
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: No more facial recognition ,
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product every time I go out of town it loses connection to my wireless system and you have to unplug it and plug it back in but first you got a wait for the battery to go dead before work again. And now they’re taking away the facial recognition.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie O

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool Security Cam
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with the packaging! Lots of mounting options to suit various locations. Love the way you can customize known faces and alerts. Motion sensing ability works really well. The only thing I'm sorry about is that it took me so long to set it up. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: does a great job. I like the motion settings so I don't get notifications for movement far away. Used by my pool and did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Replacing my ring  with the Lynx pro
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Lynx Pro for about a month now, and am extremely satisfied with it. On aestetic side of things, the packaging and branding was very nice and something I take into great consideration when buying a product. The actual device is very clean and discrete. Looking forward to adding more of their products to my home security setup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minions Cameras work Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 2 weeks. Now it's Dead. I'm stuck with a $150 dead camera
customer_reviews.author: Psycomais

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Good clear picture and love the simple swipe to zoom feature whilst still holding good pixel quality
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Camera is crap I just want my money back and I purchased 4 year warranty. They are acting like I’m asking for a kidney to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Device unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Device has completely stopped working. All troubleshooting suggestions were tried and did not work. Customer support was useless. Do not buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to install and even easier to set up. I instantly receive notifications when someone walks up to my front door and I have set it so it automatically records. My home feels so much more secure now that I have this installed.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine W.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: We have always used Dropcam/Nest cameras & loved them.... but I think we may like these a little more. we had no issues setting up the camera - it was simple enough - & the quality of the picture is nice. The sound of listening or speaking through the camera is nice too. I love 2 things about it - its good for inside or outdoors & I really like it offers 7 days of recording. The cameras we currently use, we have to pay a yearly fee that adds up when you have multiple cameras. we really may make the switch to this camera for all around our home.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: satisfied but some room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Functions as specified, especially like that there is no required subscription for pay. Software reasonably good. Cons: Wifi range comparatively limited. Crashes sometimes. Can't reset from crash remotely (when you are away from the house). Instructions for resetting from crash seem wrong (Instructions say to unplug the camera, but you can't shut off your camera by pulling the plug because of the built-in battery backup), Recording doesn't activate unless the motion is pretty close; even large objects moving some distance away taking up an important fraction of the field of view of the camera won't trigger the recording.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hacke

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up camera provides much needed peace of mind when traveling
customer_reviews.text: This security camera was very easy to install, with a nice long power cord in case it must be placed far from a power source. The bracket is a little flimsy in my opinion so you need to use care when installing. It was easy to set up but the facial recognition software is only so-so. That said, it does a great job alerting me when someone trips the motion sensor and it provides an excellent area of coverage that includes both my front door and garage. When traveling, this unit makes me feel more comfortable about the security of my house.
customer_reviews.author: C. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This camera came shipped with everything as described. It only took about 30 minutes to have it up and running with the app, etc. The app is really easy to use and it is intuitive. The battery holds a charge really well and I have the app push a notification to me when the battery is getting low. The cord is extra long, so it's easy to find a place to plug in the camera to keep it charged. I would recommend this for someone who wants a medium range security camera that is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rae

customer_reviews.title: Good solid value - recommend watching the video prior to installing
customer_reviews.text: The manual for this is terrible, but I did get it set up, however configuring the settings is a different story. I'm not sure I have the security settings are right, so I have not tried the facial recognition feature yet. The image quality is pretty good. I love the free 7 day cloud storage, and that it continues to record in the event of a power or internet outage. Overall it is a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: The evolution of the nannycam
customer_reviews.text: The nannycam has evolved. It is now equipped with free cloud storage, backup power, facial recognition, night vision, and two way communication. The principal purpose is security. As an indoor/outdoor cam I’m using it to monitor a door from inside. So far, it hasn’t found any burglars, I can’t say I am looking forward to finding someone, but at least I know I have a defense.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ware Cornell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy.  An affordable home security solution.
customer_reviews.text: Indoor or outdoor use. IP65 rating. Set up was quick and simple. Night vision is excellent. Two way audio is actually intelligible unlike some of the competition. The motion detection feature is impressively sensitive. Built in battery back up. The list of features is impressive. And more important, they are all actually useful. For the price, you can't ho wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tell It Like It Is

customer_reviews.title: The camera keep working with the internal battery it is amazing.  I really like it and work great!
customer_reviews.text: I have other Wi-Fi security cameras and this, by far, is my favorite. I installed two of them one in my home and one in my vacation property. What I like the most is the battery it keep working even the electricity go off what it happen often in my vacation apt. I really recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Good security system
customer_reviews.text: Making my home secure is top priority with me and that is why I ordered the Tend Lynx security camera. It was very easy to install and working with my WIFI in a matter of minutes. The camera is small and not noticeable at all. I am glad I do not have to sign up for a monthly bill for backup storage.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my home
customer_reviews.text: I got this to add to the overall connectedness of my home. In addition, to add to my peace of mind. This fits my overall home improvement path perfectlym
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Zolar

product_meta.title: Tend Insights Lynx Pro - Indoor/Outdoor Weatherproof Wifi Security Camera With Battery Backup, Two Way Audio, Night Vision, And Included Cloud Storage, White (Ts0031)
product_meta.description:
Security is more reliable than ever, with the Tend Secure Lynx Pro. Monitor with uninterrupted video monitoring and a robust security solution that is unmatched in the market. Built-in battery backup and local storage, Lynx Pro will store up to three days of data* if there is an outage of power, internet or both. Once power and internet returns, local data is uploaded to the cloud. *Based on one hour of recording/streaming per day.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




UNINTERRUPTED MONITORING With built-in battery backup and local storage, Lynx Pro will store up to three days of data* if there is an outage of power/internet. Once power/internet returns, local data is uploaded to the cloud. *Based on one hour of recording/streaming per day

WEATHERPROOF IP65 rating so you can protect any sensitive areas surrounding your home, and able to function in any outdoor environment.




Facial Recognition Intelligent facial recognition software lets you choose who your camera recognizes. Get a check-in notification when familiar faces arrive at your home.

Free Cloud Storage Backup and review videos with our cloud storage, included with your purchase. It’s free, so you can always see what’s happened for the previous 7 days.

Motion Detection & Instant Alerts Get immediate notifications on your mobile device for events triggered by motion detection.




Uninterrupted Monitoring Security Tend Secure Lynx Pro offers uninterrupted video monitoring and a robust security solution that is unmatched in the market.
feature_bullets: Uninterrupted monitoring lynx Pro will store up to 3 days of data in case of a power or internet outage with local data being uploaded to the cloud based on 1 hour of recording or streaming per day
Weatherproof IP65 rating so you can protect any sensitive areas surrounding your home, and able to function in any outdoor environment
Facial recognition intelligent facial recognition software lets you choose who your camera recognizes; Get a check in notification when familiar faces arrive at your home

Tend’s facial recognition technology is not available in all states; Prior to purchase, please review the complete list of states where the feature is not currently available in the FAQ section on Tend’s website
HD video quality crystal clear HD real time live video streaming and recording from your mobile device using the Tend secure app from any location
Free cloud storage backup and review videos with our cloud storage, included with your purchase; It is free, So you can always see what has happened for the previous 7 days

Built in support for 802; 11B/g/n 2 4GHz Wi-Fi band (5GHz currently not supported, please confirm that your router supports 2. 4GHz Wi-Fi band); Access your camera with the Tend secure app on your mobile device anytime, anywhere

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars65 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
